amendment.description: To provide an exception to requirements with respect to bilateral agreements for exemptions from certain licensing requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1158 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1158 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166, S9207-9208; text: CR S9164) To provide an exception to requirements with respect to bilateral agreements for exemptions from certain licensing requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1158 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1158 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136.
